title: Pythons galore
text: Probably the most interesting thing in Ouidah.  Don't go if you do not like snakes.  You get to have a python round your shoulders and then there's a pit in the temple where you can give a donation and make a wish.  Lots more pythons in the temple.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Geht so
text: Man darf eine Schlange ber√ºhren, im kleinen Haus muss man schnell durchgehen und hat keine Zeit f√ºr Bilder. Daf√ºr ist 2000chf zu viel

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Good Time at the Temple of the Python in Quidah
text:
Our group went to the Temple of the Pythons in Quidah, Benin. The Temple was small but the history of the voodoo religion in Benin is one that believes the python to be powerful and provides protection to their believers. They are not dangerous.

As we entered the temple we were asked if we wanted to hold the pythons. Before you could hold the pythons you had to wash your hands with water that the handlers provided.  Those that wanted to go inside the compound, where the 50 pythons were housed you would have to remove your shoes to enter. Inside there were pythons clustered on the ground. Once you left the compound, the gift shop was close by the exit. The gift shop had alot of wonderful objects to purchase.

As we exited the temple you could see the Basilica of Quidah directly across the street from the Temple of the Pythons. The Catholic church did not believe in the practicing of Voodoo, but they both seemed to live together in the same historic site.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Je suis tr√®s joyeux d'avoir visite cet endroit
text: Un lieux o√π vous pouvez vous ressourcer. Un endroit vous pouvez touch√© des doigts les python . Que √ßa soit un trop python ou un petit ou encore un moyen, Vous vous voir des diff√©rents objets et culture africaine

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: ≈öwiat Voodoo .
text: Dla nas to budowla bez wiƒôkszego znaczenia . Kilka niezbyt dobrze utrzymanych zabudowa≈Ñ przy centralnym placu Agoli i kilkadziesiƒÖt pyton√≥w w jednym z pomieszcze≈Ñ . Za wstƒôp siƒô p≈Çaci i nie sƒÖ to dobrze wydane pieniƒÖdze.  Dla wyznawc√≥w Voodoo to jednak miejsce ≈õwiƒôte . Przed tƒÖ ≈õwiƒÖtynia co roku 10 stycznia odbywajƒÖ siƒô tradycyjne obchody Festiwalu Voodoo czyli Vodun Days. Zje≈ºd≈ºajƒÖ siƒô kap≈Çani i szamani Voodoo , plemienni wodzowie ze swoimi ≈õwitami ale te≈º t≈Çumy miejscowych i zagraniczni tury≈õci . Przy potƒô≈ºnych d≈∫wiƒôkach r√≥≈ºnych bƒôbn√≥w odbywajƒÖ siƒô rytualne ta≈Ñce i taneczne korowody . Dla nas trochƒô szokujƒÖce mogƒÖ byƒá makija≈ºe i ubiory [ a czasem ich czƒô≈õciowy brak ] i rodzaj "amoku" czy transu  w kt√≥rym wydajƒÖ siƒô byƒá ta≈ÑczƒÖcy . Na razie ,p√≥ki co nie jest to robione pod turyst√≥w. Festiwalowe ceremonia≈Çy w przeciwie≈Ñstwie do samej ≈õwiƒÖtyni pyton√≥w sƒÖ bardzo ciekawe i wciƒÖgajƒÖce. 9 stycznia mo≈ºna by≈Ço bez problemu wej≈õƒá  na plac i wmieszaƒá siƒô w ta≈ÑczƒÖcy czy obserwowaƒá zacnych go≈õci . 10 stycznia w czasie g≈Ç√≥wnych obchod√≥w Festiwalu ju≈º to by≈Ço bardzo utrudnione choƒá nie niemo≈ºliwe.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Storia interessante, esperienza particolare
text: E certamente un‚Äôesperienza particolare quella di vedere tanti pitoni insieme, di portarli su di s√© e di ascoltare come si svolgono preghiere e cerimonie vodoo. Ouidah √® il centro del vodoo

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: The Vatican of Voodoism
text: This Vatican of Voodoism is a good introduction to West Africa‚Äôs traditional religion. At the entrance they will ask you for an astronomical entry fee - that includes the Sacred Grove and the Door of No Return. Say you only want to visit the temple, and the price comes down to one-sixth. A young English-speaking guide is included in the fee.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not worth a special trip but the baobab tree was nice
text: They asked for 5000 CFA (price is 1000 CFA)  I nipped that in the bud. There is a 5 minute tour, they put a small python around your neck you take your shoes off and go in a room with 25 small sleeping pythons.  There is a 400 year-old baobab tree outside which was nice

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Main thing to see is the python around your neck. The temple itself is not spectacular
text:
The story of the temple definitely has its cultural value. But for a touristic value ,  the main thing is the python to touch/around the neck.
And not pythons everywhere as I thought ü§£.  They ate kept in a round hut.

If you want a python jn your neck-  here us the place to be.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Had a python around my neck
text: The guide told us about the voodoo ceremonies conducted here. Loved the small building with the pythons and had the chance to have one around my neck.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: We enjoyed our visit
text:
The temple site is very interesting and we enjoyed being given details of its background and the rituals and ceremonies still carried out there. It was interesting to learn about the pythons and get to hold one (they are clearly treasured by the temple and local people and are considered sacred). We heard the temple was very touristy (including from the Bradt Guide) and although we can see what is meant by that we still really enjoyed our visit and would recommend it to others. 
(We visited with local English-speaking guide, R√©mi Seglonou (recommended in the latest version of the Bradt Guide) who was also brilliant).

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Belle arnaque
text:
Une belle arnaque comme le disent les commentaires pr√©c√©dents.
35000 cfa pour 3 pour la visite du temple et la route des esclaves.
Une visite exp√©di√©e de 10 min pour le temple, dans lequel on nous demande encore de l'argent si on souhaite faire un voeu ...
Par contre visite assez int√©ressante pour la route des esclaves mais il aurait √©t√© pr√©f√©rable de r√©gler directement le guide (qui est ind√©pendant).
Bref c'est dommage pour le site historique qui m√©rite mieux.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: I took some of my clients there.
text: It's the the best place to be in Ouidah if you ever want to learn about the life style of pythons.  You can take some photos with the photos on your neck.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Sans int√©r√™t, pi√®ge √† touristes
text: Aucun int√©r√™t, passez votre tour (sauf si vous voulez payer pour avoir un petit python d‚Äô√† peine 1 m√®tre autour du cou). Visite exp√©di√©e en 10 minutes, le guide n‚Äô√©tait pas aimable, il ne nous a pas expliqu√© grand chose. Apr√®s avoir fait toutes les autres visites culturelles et historiques de Ouidah (qui √©taient tr√®s int√©ressantes), celle-ci n‚Äôapprend rien de nouveau.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Small but worth a visit
text: There isn't much to see here and the temple is quite small but it provides some context to the roots and practices of voodoo. Probably the most interesting part of the tour is the python room and they take out the snakes so be aware in case you have fear of large snakes, even though pythons are harmless.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Decevant
text:
Nous y sommes all√©es en famille pour faire le temple de pythons et la route des esclaves. A l entr√©e du temple on nous propose un tarif pour l ensemble, on est 6, 50000, tr√®s tr√®s tr√®s exag√©r√©, on n√©gocie un peu mais √ßa baisse peu. On est l√†, on y va, tant pis. Pour ce qui est du temple des pythons, hyper d√©cevant, 10 minutes de visite, bien que l‚Äôhistoire soit int√©ressante, c est vraiment exp√©di√© et tr√®s superficiel, surtout si on a d√©j√† fait d‚Äôautres mus√©es au B√©nin. Une bonne impression d‚Äôarnaque, je n‚Äôai m√™me pas pris de photos tellement c √©tait inutile. 
 La route des esclaves par contre est vraiment √† faire, car charg√©e d‚Äôhistoire et on traverse le village. Cependant, elle est en travaux jusqu‚Äôen d√©cembre 2022 environ selon le guide, donc pr√©f√©rez y aller apr√®s cette date. Le va et viens des camions, la route retourn√©e et la porte de non retour camoufl√©e derri√®re des palissades ont quelque peu g√¢ch√© notre visite mais nous sommes malgr√© tout contents de l‚Äôavoir fait. 
Il est possible de trouver un guide (indispensable pour la route des esclaves) √† l‚Äôentr√©e de la ville. Ils ont leur carte professionnelle autour du cou, je pense que ce sera plus abordable qu‚Äôavec le forfait du temple o√π finalement on ne sait pas bien √† qui va profiter l‚Äôargent.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Temple des Pythons , Lieu Sacr√© devenu un Amusement pour Touristes !!
text:
Le temple Dangb√© ( des Pythons ) est un sanctuaire Vaudou qui se trouve juste en face de la Basilique de l'Immacul√©e Conception , comme un pied de nez au Christianisme !! Ce lieu existe depuis le 17 √®me si√®cle , mais a subit depuis , des transformations . Au d√©part , situ√© sur un espace bois√© , il a √©t√© progressivement r√©duit √† ce que l'on voit aujourd'hui du fait de l'urbanisation de la ville d'Ouidah . De m√™me , les b√¢timents que l'on voit aujourd'hui couleur ocre et toit en tuiles ou en t√¥le , ont √©t√© r√©nov√©s en 1991 pour la manifestation de 1992 ou Ouidah accueille le premier festival mondial consacr√© √† l'art et √† la culture du Vaudou,

La premi√®re cour , que l'on voit en arrivant , est pourvue d'un b√¢timent en forme de c√¥ne de couleur ocre recouvert de tuiles , qui renferme les pythons royaux vivants , qui ne pr√©sentent aucun danger pour l'homme . Face √† l'entr√©e , on peut voir l'Iroko sacr√© entour√© d'un linge blanc . Sur le cot√© une grosse boule en terre cuite " Le Canari " sacr√© appel√© le " Zingbin " existe depuis 200 ans  . On le c√©l√®bre tous les 7 ans , en l'installant devant le temple et on y d√©pose des feuilles sacr√©es  . Initialement , 41 jeunes filles vierges allaient chercher de l'eau pour y d√©poser les feuilles et les triturer dans le liquide . Le m√©lange est emport√© par les participants √† des fins curatives . A d√©faut de filles vierges ( SIC) ce sont des femmes m√©nopaus√©es qui assurent le rituel .

Sur le cot√© , une case ouverte d√©pourvue de mobilier mais abritant une divinit√© protectrice Vaudou , est couverte d'un toit en t√¥le . Deux petites cases rondes couvertes de tuiles servent d'abri √† d'autres divinit√©s Vaudou . 
Si vous avez la bonne id√©e de payer 2000 francs √† l'entr√©e , pour le prise de photos , le maitre des pythons vous propose de vous en mettre un autour du cou et de pendre une photo . Je me suis trouv√© le seul √† vouloir tenter l'exp√©rience , car les autres √©taient horrifi√©s . En fait comme je le pressentais , ce python est inoffensif et m√™me caressant !!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: POUR GOGOS
text: Ici commence le vaudou pour gogos ! Ou le vaudou pour les nuls si vous pr√©f√©rez. 20 mn de visite, quelques explications sommaires, un python autour du cou pour la photo et le tour et jou√© direction la sortie. Parfaitement dispensable.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Worth a quick visit if in the area but not much to see
text:
You can't really spend more than 20 minutes in this place. There is very, very little to see. As you walk in, you pay 1,000CFA to enter or 2,000CFA if you also want to take pictures. There are guides (both English and French speaking) available. These are compulsory.

The guide takes you around the very small complex where there are a few interesting artefacts from the voodoo religion. The circular hut where the pythons are is, unsurprisingly, the main attraction. You can go inside, hold the pythons and take a few pictures. The pythons don't seem to do much except sleep. The guide was friendly and there are a few interesting souvenirs in the shop at the end of the tour.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Fascinating
text: This is an amazing place if you‚Äôre not afraid of snakes. The pythons are harmless. This is a religious site, and you can go inside the temple for some quality time with the pythons. Recommend.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A must see, but not a long stop
text: There is really only one thing to see here, but the story of the snakes is fascinating. The guides do a good job of answering questions also.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Short and interesting stop during a trip
text:
The temple is rather small, but they do have a room full of snakes - I would estimate 30-40 pythons of various sizes.

You can safely take them in your hand and make the obligatory photos with the snake calmly resting on your neck (or in your hands).

Its definitely a must-see when you are in Ouidah!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A must visit place
text:
While visiting the historical city of Ouidah, it is a must seen place to go to and see how the local religion cohabitated very well with those religions imported through colonization. This temple is full of pythons which are do not bit human beings and with whom you can play. 
It is a must experienced element of Benin.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Tr√®s surfait
text:
Un tarif d'entr√©e non n√©gligeable pour ne pas voir grand chose, quelques pythons √† demi-endormis et un "guide" peu avenant.
5 minutes de visite tout au plus, et vraiment rien √† voir.
Peut amuser les enfants, mais peu int√©ressant.
Un moyen pour les locaux de "plumer" un peu plus le touriste "Yovo". En sortie de l'enclos des vendeurs des souvenirs, tout est d'une banalit√© affligeante.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Lieu a visiter absolument
text: Bonjour , c'est un endroit tr√®s historique a visiter absolument . Si vous voulez faire partir de notre groupe de touristes internationaux pour visiter cet endroit et pleins d'autres au B√©nin a l'occasion de la f√™te annuelle du vodoun en Janvier 2020  , contactez moi: +447554783736 .

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Waah!
text: A must. I never thought I'd put one around my neck but I did. Fascinating indeed...they release them at night to feed and the villagers bring them back!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: More touristic than authenti, but still fun!
text: Feels more like a tourist trap than an authentic traditional spot. However, it is very impressive to hold a python. Guide were not very delicate. One was talking to me and the other just put the python around my neck without any warning. Fortunately I was calm, but I know many people who would have fainted!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Une mascarade
text: Des pythons soi-disant sacr√©s mais auxquels on tape sur la t√™te? Les d√©cors sont en b√©ton et repeints sans go√ªt. Rien d'authentique l√†-dedans. Bref une visite inutile qui laisse un go√ªt amer de fond de commerce juteux.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not so much to see
text: This is a voodoo temple where they keep all pythons they found in the area and release during the night beside the  animals not so much to see . After visit you have to pass the shop to get out :-)

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Un vrai temple qui ressemble √† son nom
text: Lieu de culte Vodoun o√π le serpent python est toujours ador√© et prot√©g√©. On retrouve la divinit√© des √©l√©ments de la nature dans lieux de haute spiritualit√©. Vous serez en contacte direct avec le python, animal ou divinit√©.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Rich culture and Vudoo at Ouidah, Benin
text: The irony of having a Catholic church right opposite the python Temple known for Vudoo is amusing. The Genesis of the temple is something worth knowing about. And the most interesting part is having a Python swing from around your neck. It is scary but a MUST do when you go to the temple. It's all about Pythons and strong Vudoo beliefs. Anthropologist would love it here. The love for thrill took me there to experience the pythons. I encourage you to go there too. Ouidah is about an hour from town. You can then follow the walk of no return by the slaves in the same place.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A sacred place
text: Pythons are very sacred creatures. This temple is dedicated to them and they are worshipped by the people of Ouidah. The tour lasted about 30 minutes and included holding a python and a look into the python temple where the pythons are crawling around freely on the floor. Once a month, the pythons are let out into the village to eat and then slowly return back.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Fascinating temple
text: Temple revering pythons.  Over 50 live there.  Guides brought a couple out to meet us.  My friends felt comfortable with a snake around their neck, but I was not so sure.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Snake Temple
text: Pythons are worshiped in Ouidah a city or a region in Benin. Apart from the snake that will be shown you in the temple, trees and other elements they worship are shown you too with their history.The pythons are not venomous so it was okay to be hanged around the necks of tourists

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: inutile
text: le vaudou en mode acc√©l√©r√© !!prendre un python en main !bref une belle attraction attrape nigaud ...

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Must see. Went to satisfy my curiosity
text: The royal pythons are worshipped in Ouidah. You are shown different things like the tree they worship, the jug used to fetch water that is used to cleanse the town, the snakes etc. You can take pictures with the snakes. I was too scared to wrap around my neck though. You should know that pythons are not venomous, the big ones kill by constriction so you are safe

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Visit the Python Temple.
text: If you want to visit Benin, then you must visit the  Pythons Temple, Over 60 pythons housed and worshipped within the walls of this voodoo temple .

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Enjoyed the outer wall paintings and designs
text: We entered for free during the January 10 ceremonies and did not have to deal with the fake guides and irritating staff there, Luckily  I would suggest that you have a look at the outer walls decoration from the outside all around the temple. It is much more attractive and interesting. This is NOT the place to learn about Voodoo.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Attrattiva curiosa
text: Interessante tempio dedicato all'animismo del Benin; visitato con guida ed entrato nel locale dove si possono vedere decine di pitoni

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Python hautnah
text: Der Eintrittspreis ist vern√ºnftig f√ºr das, was geboten wird, allerdings bezahlt man nich mal das doppelte pro Person, wenn einer aus der Gruppe Fotos machen m√∂chte. Die Erkl√§rungen zu der Bedeutung der Pythons f√ºr die Voodoo Religion waren ein bisschen oberfl√§chlich. Aber man k√∂nnte die Pythons anfassen und sich auch um den Hals h√§ngen lassen.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Nothing to see. Poor
text: It is better to come with a guide. If you come without a guide, you will get one at the entrance. If you speak English, try to get a toureg guide and not Ippolit. Ippolit does not speak English. It would be very uninteresting, if you go with Ippolit. The entrance fee is 1.000CFA, if you want to take photos - 2.000 more. What can you see? A barrack with 20-30 small pythons up to 1.5 meters, 3 signs and a place of chicken sacrifice. In front of the "temple" you can see 400 year old baobab. Or much younger but you cannot check it.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Aiutoooooo
text: Immaginavo qualcosa di pi√π, alla fine c‚Äô√® solo una stanza piena di pitoni liberi √® possibile toccarli o prenderli in braccio

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not what I expected
text: Visited this as part of a group tour. Not what I expected. Basically just a very small building full of pythons and not much else. The pythons are quite small and you can hold them. There is not much decoration to see and it‚Äôs a bit run down.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: pour la photo avec un python
text:
Visite rapide avec un guide qui fournit des explications sur les rites vaudou. 
J'ai clairement trouver cela moyen au niveau des explications. 
Si on est supersticieux ou pratiquant du vaudou, on peut faire une offrande √† un arbre sacr√©. 
On a la possibilit√© d'avoir un petit python autour du cou, et de prendre des photos (si on a pay√© le suppl√©ment photo) ; soit 3000F CFA
On peut aussi voir l'entr√©e d'un petit espace ferm√© ou il y a plusieurs python et de prendre des photos. 

La visite se termine par un mini march√© artisanal et un guide qui n√©gocie un pourboire.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Famous Voodoo Landmark
text: Worth the visit if you‚Äôre interested in voodoo. The guide will explain some of the beliefs and ceremonies associated with the temple. It is a small temple with not much character. You can also hold the pythons and pose for photos with them.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: phyton temple
text: the place is small and boring. other than holding the phyton, i dont see any needs to visit this places other than its relation to vodoo

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Pas exceptionnel
text: Un "pi√®ge" √† touristes mais sympa pour celui qui n'a jamais vu un python, car il y en a beaucoup √† cet endroit

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Can't have snake fobia!
text: It's very interesting to understand the religion and beliefs of the land! Ouida is the spiritual capital of Benin and the countries around it (togo, nigeria and borkina faso). And you can (it's not obligatory) hold a snake around your neck.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: The holy pythons of Ouidah
text: Very worth a visit. It is not a circusact with animals but a century old religious happening. It's told that at night the snakes leave the shed where they are to look for food. In contrair what the guide told I remain thinking it's a myth.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: 10 minutes max!
text: La visite ne dure que quelques minutes, tout tourne autour de la "mise de pythons dans le cou", apr√®s, c'est pas mal √ßa. Il faut payer un prix √† l'entr√©e, le double si on veut prendre des photos, un peu plus pour un arbre voodoo, un peu plus pour prendre des photos √† l'int√©rieur de la "maison" des pythons (jeunes, petites tailles), et le tour de 10 minutes se termine dans une zone de vente d'objets touristiques qu'on retrouve partout au B√©nin. L'histoire qu'on nous raconte est int√©ressante (comme toutes celles des origines b√©ninoises)... mais, √† la fin, la visite ne vaut pas la peine, √† moins de n'avoir rien √† faire √† Ouidah.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not for the faint hearted!
text: I love adventure and love to try new things. Do you? Would you take photos with a royal python around your neck? it's your call... :)

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Revealing Cultural Experience - A must!
text: Sada and I visited the temple together with colleagues on a training visit and were impressed. Tour guides present on site have great knowledge of the religion and culture surrounding the worship. It's a cultural visit on a different level and a must for anyone coming to Benin with the desire to understand the spiritual experience of the peoples. Fascinating that the temple is located right opposite the Basilica, and its a shame that it's geographic location on the map is referenced directly to the Basilica.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Ancient Culture brought alive in Whydah
text: This trip took my tourists to ancient Africa in a very conservative historical town. In this place, what is required is a good heart  and you have nothing to fear as you enter the pythons pit or carry them around your neck. The history is deep, beautiful, but fearful to some.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Traditions et superstitions
text: si on aime les pythons. C'est un m√©lange de temple traditionnel et d‚Äôhistoire de superstitions. Mais si on est √† Ouidah, il faut le visiter.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Temple Of Python
text:
Here is the Temple where Pythons are being worshipped.
There are so many Pythons in the Temple with their history

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Exp√©rience unique
text: A faire. Le temple se visite assez rapidement de par sa taille. Le guide vous expliquera les origines du temple et du vodoo. Vous visiterez le temple des pythons sacr√©s et pourrez les porter autour du coup sans danger. Tr√®s belle exp√©rience.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Literally a temple with pythons
text: We visited with a guide and were able to go into the temple where many, many pythons were sleeping. It's a very small temple and there isn't a lot to do except see the pythons. We were able to handle them and learned that they are released during the night and return before dawn. They are viewed as a blessing by the locals, so they are welcome in the community. Worth a visit if you're in the area, but keep realistic expectations.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Sans int√©r√™t
text: Une guide commis d'office explique le pourquoi du comment dans la cour du temple... Rien de passionnant en r√©alit√©, un b√¢timent rond o√π sont gard√©s une cinquantaine de pythons, un tronc d'arbre mort 'sacr√©' et un trou √† sacrifices... Pourboire r√©clam√© et passage oblig√© par les stands de souvenirs √† la sortie, bref sans int√©r√™ts!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Something that has to do with Voodoo
text: Visited this place and learned that people are still involved in praising pythons. They believe in ancestors customs

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not sure a must do but cool Instagram pic opportunity
text: This is a very basic temple which houses hundreds of pythons. The most interesting part was a guided tour but it would have been better to understand the history more. Then after a guided tour you get a picture with a python around your neck and for the daring you can enter the temple. I'm not going to say this is a must do and I can't say my life has been enriched because of this experience. I can say it's interesting and its kinda cool for Instagram photos.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A must visit if you are part or studying this culture/religion
text: Growing up with rattlesnakes in my yard this wasn't my favourite place to be, but having spent a lot of time in the past few days trying to understand the Voodoo religion/culture I felt I needed to enter the temple.  As hard as it was I was glad to have the experience to help gain a better understanding.  I felt the snakes could have had a better place to stay, but knowing they were safe there and are allowed to leave the compound regularly made me feel a bit better.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A Voodoo temple/tourist attraction
text: Obviously a regularly used Voodoo temple, this was an interesting stop. You will need a guide as you would have no idea of the part the python plays in their ceremony and certainly wouldn't be able to take time and handle the snakes and go into the small dark enclosure where maybe 15 or more live. Not the most colourful or picturesque place but interesting when fully explained.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Sad little place
text: This is a dreadful place. I know it has significance for the local Voodoo worshippers, but there is little to see except a pit of pythons and then the rather sad ritual of tourists having their picturebrajen with a snake around their necks......which has nothing to do with Voodoo ritual but is tacky tourism at its worst. Snakes or any reptile should not be used in this way.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Ormai solo una attrazione turistica.
text: Il Tempio dei pitoni si trova nella piazza principale di Ouidah, proprio di fronte alla basilica cattolica, a testimoniare il sincretismo di questa popolazione che accosta un tempio cristiano a un tempio animista, anche se ormai sembra che il significato religioso sia svanito, dato che ho visto soltanto turisti. Entrando nel tempio dopo aver pagato il biglietto, si accede al cortile principale, dove c'√® un angolino con un feticcio, mentre invece la casa dei serpenti √® il piccolo edificio rotondo sulla destra. Si entra nella casa a piccoli gruppi, per non disturbare troppo i rettili. Un guardiano esce con un paio di pitoni e li avvolge intorno al collo dei turisti. Ieri anch'io ho avuto il piacere di toccarne alcuni e di farmi fotografare con dei serpenti addosso. Un'esperienza molto particolare. Tornando alla casa, all'interno ci sono pitoni di tutte le dimensioni, compresi alcuni poco pi√π che neonati, che strisciano indisturbati sul pavimento e lungo i muri. Attenzione a non pestarli.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Best snake experience
text: Python snakes well keep with a strong history to it. Make sure you absorb the history first before experiencing the snakes round your neck for some few minutes. IT'S SAFE.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Faut pas avoir peur de serpents !
text:
Un temple voodoo n‚Äôa pas la grandeur d‚Äô une √©glise, mais la culte du python est une des plus importantes dans la r√©ligion voodoo.
Il faut payer extra pour prendre des photos, mais si seulement on le faisait partout au B√©nin, au lieu de l‚Äô interdire express√©ment comme √† Abomey...
Le guide √©tait bien, et l‚Äô int√©rieur du temple, qui grouille de pythons, n‚Äô est pas un lieu pour enfants, impressionant quand-m√™me.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: M√©rite le detour
text:
Le temple des python vaut le d√©tour, pour 1000 francs par personne un guide nous explique la place des pythons dans la culture locale et nous emm√®ne dans le temple qui contenaient, lorsque nous y √©tions, une quarantaine de pythons. Possibilit√© de prendre une photo avec un serpent autour du cou pour les plus courageux.
Compter 2000 francs pour pouvoir prendre des photos.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: bien avec le guide
text: Une petite sortie sympas d'une trentaine de minutes dans le centre de Ouidah, on vous explique la relation du culte avec les pythons. Le guide que nous avions parlait trop faiblement cependant. Rajouter un peu d'argent pour prendre des photos avec les pythons autour du cou ;)

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Vaudou
text:
Un lieu assez intimiste ou l on prend le temps de vous expliquer le vaudou et les significations des lieux. 
Bien s√ªr vous pouvez aussi entrer dans la piece  aux pythons et en mettre un autour du cou

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Arnaque
text: Une petite cabane o√π s‚Äôentassent des pythons dans de sales conditions.  Les explications sont tr√®s succintes, le lieu est presque ridicule et surtout l‚Äôappat du gain avec la photo avec le python payante on nous le dit apres bien sur

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Visit√© plusieurs fois
text: Toujours surprenant pour les amis ou parents qui nous accompagnent lors de la visite. Tout un symbole, qui repr√©sente parfaitement le B√©nin et son histoire : le culte du Python face √† la Cath√©drale !

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Aucun int√©r√™t sauf pour se prendre en photo avec les pitons
text: Pas grand chose √† voir mais vraiment pas grand chose mis √† part les dizaines de pitons dans la pi√®ce. Se prendre en photo avec un piton autour du cou est le seul moment utile de la visite.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Snakes on the Plane
text: Driving up to the temple is very interesting because it is right across the street from a Church. The history of the place as narrated by our guide Fostine is that the Snake worshipers have unique markings so you know the phyton people when you see them. There are about 3 gatekeepers before you enter but our guide had the juice and whisked us in. I am not really a snake person so am glad they were not slithering around when I entered the temple. It is in the true fashion of a mini-village worship area, and the snakes are tucked away in a little house. A snake was brought out for us by a priest to take pictures with I  opted out but you can take your million dollar image with the python spirits if you so wish. I also pushed myself to go into the little house they live in and there are snakes everywhere so watch where you step. Overall a nice capture in the Voodoo Phyton people and their rituals. Benin is known to be one of the biggest Voodoo capitals of the world so if you are into the Voodoo that they do you need to go and visit. They also host one of the biggest Voodoo Festivals in the world.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Interesting visit
text: It doesn't take long to see the temple - there is just a small room with the pythons in and a sacred tree. Our guide spoke good English and was very informative, answering all of our questions. Learning about the culture was fascinating - I think the tour could be really brief, but it'll be longer and you'll get more from it if you ask more questions.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Religious site
text:
Our guide explained that Pythons are not worshipped but part of a religious service to commemorate their help in rescuing a king of the local people from invading warriors. It was also noted while the temple has become a tourist attraction and some snakes are tame and safe to handle other buildings that house sacred snakes are off limits and access is only granted to true devotees.
There is also a sacred tree in the compound and it is interesting that Ouida's Catholic basilica is directly across the street.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Frissons garantis
text: Lieu regroupant un nombre incalculable de serpents que l'on peut porter autour du cou (pour les plus courageux!).

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: We held pythons
text: One of the priests gave us a guided tour. It was interesting. If you visit Ouidah, you should be sure to take time for this place.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Atypique
text: Un petit d√©tour sympathique. Tourne plus autour de l'histoire du vaudou que de l'animal cela dit. En bonus une petite photo avec l'ami python.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Moment de frisson
text: Classique activit√© √† faire en passant par Ouidah. Se frotter aux pythons inoffensifs  du temple Vaudoun  situ√© juste en face de l'√©glise catholique de la ville. T√©moin de la mixit√© et de la tol√©rance entre les diff√©rentes religions du B√©nin.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: viaje semana santa 2017
text: En mi opinion una turistada,un par de edificios con pitones peque√±itas,que al final te ponen en el cuello para que te eches una foto.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Int√©ressant
text: J'ai ador√©, on peut porter les serpents, apr√®s, il ne faut pas en avoir peur m√™me s'ils sont inoffensifs!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: great little stop
text:
I loved the stop here.  But then again I love seeing snakes.
If you dont love snakes you will be disappointed.  The whole tour honestly takes less than 15 minutes and that includes stopping and holding the snakes for photos. 
Inside the main temple was probably at least 70 pythons.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: fun little visit
text:
It doesnt take long to see the temple, maybe half hour at best.  The highlight of course is the room where the pythons are mainly kept.  Hard to estimate how many are inside but at least 50.
My favorite part was getting up close with one of the snakes.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Good for seeing the pythons (and getting one around your neck), as well as learning the story behind it all
text: This is a small place: just a little temple and a sacred tree.  It could be better maintained, admittedly.  But the story of the python worship as part of voodoo and getting a snake wrapped around your neck (even if you don't want it!), makes it a must stop when you are in Ouidah.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Si vois passez par la
text: Rien d exceptionnel. Mais si vous passez par la, pourquoi pas. Des exploration sur les pythons dans la culture vaudou

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Enrichissant et ludique
text: Une visite enrichissante et tres int√©ressante. On y apprend beaucoup que le vaudou, les sacrifices, les rituels, les croyances. Les pythons sont La et on peut les porter sans danger, les enfants adorent! √Ä faire!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Quietness with some fast heart-rate!
text: This is not a must do but quite an interesting experience to understand more about local beliefs and play with pythons. :)

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Vodu Cultuur
text: De tempel van de Phytons is zeker de moeite waard om te bezoeken. De zoon van de Voodoo Priester daar is een begenadigd spreker die de bezoeker duidelijk uitlegt dat Voodoo helemaal anders bedoeld is dan de " poppetjes met spelden" die wij hierbij voor ogen hebben. Voodoo is in eerste instantie een cultuur godsdienst bedoeld om mensen op een goede manier te ondersteunen op hun levenspad. Helaas zijn er altijd mensen die hun macht willen gebruiken voor slechte zaken, macht of financi√´le verrijking. Overigens komt dat niet alleen voor bij de voodoo godsdienst maar er zijn ook genoeg "predikers" die met de bijbel in de hand een sekte oprichten . Ik

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: int√©ressant, √† voir en passant
text: Une visite assez int√©ressante, √† voir en passant. Etonnant culte des pythons, qui se trouvent juste en face de la Basilique chr√©tienne.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Snakes!
text:
We had a short visit to the temple. 

Our guide explained all about the voodoo shrines within the complex and how worshippers will come to make sacrifices to their ancestors. 

The visited culminated with us entering the python house where the snakes live. Our 4 and 6 year olds loved seeing and handling the snakes. 

The snakes are used to being handled and it's completely safe. 

It was a fun visit.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Serpientes!
text: Sin duda visita obligatoria en Ouidah. El precio de la entrada es barato.Te explican un poco sobre la cultura vud√∫ y sobre el √°rbol sagrado y diversas deidades el plato fuerte viene al final cuando entras a una habitaci√≥n llena de serpientes (inofensivas) y te haces fotos con ellas

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Quite an experience
text: I visited here since it was the sacred temple of the Voodoo religion. So read up on it first to know the background helps to appreciate it better.  Its a tiny temple with a huge 700 year old sacred tree that is also worshiped.  People come there to ask for boons and if granted they pay a second visit to give whatever they promised.  You can see the bones of chickens and goats which had been sacrificed there.  The highlight is the sacred pythons which are either sleeping, some of them crawling about inside the temple.  They allow you to carry the python, or the guide places it around your neck.The doors of the temple are open once a month to allow them to go out inside the town or wherever, feed and many return after a day or two.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Excellent
text:
Notre guide √©tait vraiment sympa et int√©ress√© par ce qu'il disait. 
Il a r√©pondu √† beaucoup de questions au del√† du seul temple. 
Le lieu est surprenant sinon.  Comme souvent au b√©nin,  l'architecture n'a aucun int√©r√™t, mais l'atmosph√®re avec des dizaines de pythons a qqch de surr√©aliste

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Waste of time
text:
Overpriced- the guide didn't say a thing about voodoo and just insisted on placing the python on me. He then had the rudeness to ask for a tip (after a 5 min 'tour')

If you want a photo with a snake - here is your place. Otherwise, it's just snakes in a room..

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: nice
text: nice location, you should get a guide for this day so he explain about the history and the tradition of this place

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Impressionnant.  Personnes sensibles, s'abstenir
text: Impressionnant.  Visit√© avec un guide.  dans le temple une centaine de pythons.  Le sorcier du coin (gardien) est ... tr√®s inspir√© et explique avec soins les rites vaudous

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Wenig fotogene Anlage
text: Hier kommt es mehr auf die Erkl√§rungen zu den verschiedenen Voodooritualen an. Das Foto der Besucher mit Python um den Hals ist ein visueller H√∂hepunkt, manche Opferstelle sieht auf den ersten Blick wie eine M√ºllablage von Getr√§nkeflaschen aus, hat aber ihren Sinn als Opferstelle.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Pour la photo souvenir avec les enfants ....
text:
Vraisemblablement la seule fois ou un python autour du cou de votre enfant vous fera sourire... sans autre grand int√©r√™t sinon tenter de decrypter quels types de rites et traditions sont preserv√©s et repr√©sent√©es dans le temple...
Si toutefois les visites, payantes, permettent de maintenir ces charmantes b√™tes....
Visitez la basilique en face, spacieuse, lumineuse.... !

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Schockierend
text:
Ein dreckiges Gel√§nde mit kleinem Lehmbau, der sich als Pythontempel entpuppen sollte.
Die Schlangen vegetieren in diesem Loch vor sich hin. Es gibt au√üer diesem erb√§rmlichen Bild leider nichts interessantes zu entdecken. Hierf√ºr soll der Besucher neben dem Eintritt auch noch f√ºr das Fotografieren bezahlen.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Pretty cool
text: Not spectacular but a good activity. Interesting to learn about voodoo and native religions.  The snakes are in a small temple.   Fun to hold but not so sure they live in the best conditions.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Fun experience if you're not afraid of snakes
text: Wrapping a python around my neck was a fun, thrilling experience. Even though the snakes are docile, it's still not the more reassuring feeling. Except for the pythons, there's not much to see there. There's a bit of information about the voodoo culture, but that's it.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: if you want to drape python round your neck........
text: A small courtyard with a shrine for sacrifices and a building with about 60 docile pythons which are venerated in the Beninois version of Voodoo (very different to Haiti or Cuba). You get an explanation of the basics of the voodoo faith in which female pythons are venerated and supposedly only positive wishes are acceptable. And if you want to handle a 1.5m python and wear it around your neck, this is your chance.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Not really a temple ..
text: One building contains a number of pythons .. Not like visiting snake or rat temples in India. No atmosphere and not even sure why the snakes are there ? Not worth going out of our a for.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Voodoo!
text: Wil je kennismaken met voodoo dan is dit je kans! De mensen leggen je het graag uit en een mooi detail, een katholieken kerk ligt er zo ongeveer naast. Echt een aanrader.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: if you don't fearsnakes....
text: this is the place for you. hacealook, hang them around your neck, be done in 10 minutes. it's Ouidah....in Benin.....it's a highlight believe me.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Amazing
text: Well, it was described, I had a personal tour guide who took me round and explained everything in detail. For people who do not speak French, It might be difficult . It was worth every dime I spent.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Bacana
text: Interessante para quem gosta de cobras. A entrada √© baratinha, mas os ajudantes esperam uma contribui√ß√£o sempre que voc√™ encostar em uma cobra.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: La vera Africa
text: Gi√† dal nome si pu√≤ intuire la presenza di centinaia di pitoni, che abitano indisturbati il tempio. Ce ne sono di tutte le dimensioni dai piccoli ai pi√π grandi! Potrete prenderli, logicamente trattandoli con il massimo rispetto in quanto sono considerati sacri. All'interno delle persone vi spiegheranno alcuni rituali e alcune storie sul tempio! Consiglio di scattare una foto con un pitone attorno al collo!!

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Interesting but don't go if you are scared by snakes
text: I don't know what I expected from the Temple of Pythons, but definitely I didn't expect to have pythons free to go around my feet! So, if you are afraid of snakes, don't go. If you are not afraid is worth a visit.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: If holding a python is "your thing"...
text: If holding a python is "your thing", then go for it. But don't have big expectations. The place itself is not imposing (quite the contrary) and its only worht for the experience of handling the python.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Le Python, divinit√© protectrice
text:
A Ouidah, le python se v√©n√®re. L‚Äôhistoire nous apprend que les Hou√©da, fondateur de Savi, capitale de Ouidah adorait le python, animal protecteur et bienfaiteur

La mort d‚Äôun python √† Ouidah donne lieu aux m√™mes rituels et c√©r√©monie d‚Äôinhumation que pour les Hou√©da, autochtone de Ouidah

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: De belles photos √† prendre
text:
Parfait pour faire des photos avec un python autour du coup pour impressionner les amis :)

L'endroit impressionne, beaucoup de pythons

A voire si on a le temps..

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Overpriced and uninspiring unless you're desperate to see sleepy snakes
text: The temple is tiny and the buildings are uninspiring. There is little to excite you here, unless you are desperate to see some very sleepy pythons. The guided tour is not particularly interesting, and the description of voodoo is very basic. I didn't really learn anything, although I liked the story that they could no longer find 21 year old virgins to sacrifice, so had to use menopausal women!  Oh, and it's grossly over-priced. It's about a 10 minute visit, and all you end up with is a photo of you with a dopey python round your neck.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: A faire,
text:
Si vous √™tes de passage √† Ouidah et que vous n'avez pas peur des serpents, autant en profiter pour visiter le temple des Pythons. La visite est rapide (moins d'une heure)

Vous pourrez toucher et prendre des Pythons sur vous. Ce site est aussi int√©ressant pour le c√¥t√© culturel.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Interesting but not major Attraction
text: The temple is in a close confined place. There was a local guy who explains the history and the very existence of the temple. Its quite fascinating to learn about a new culture. An annual ceremony is  being held in the month of January. The locales perform rituals to a tree, an earthen pot and of course interestingly to the snakes. One can pose with the snakes wrapped around them and take photo. Nice place to see if you are in Benin.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Super
text: C'est un lieu qui vaut le d√©tour avec un guide. Un endroit aux allures mystiques avec ses serpents et arbres v√©n√©r√©s par les adeptes du vaudou. Mais il t√©moigne de la diversit√© culturelle et religieuse qui fait le charme de ce monde.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons

title: Wow
text: A good precursor to the voodoo festival.  We went here before the festival and it explained a lot before we saw the ceremony.

title: practically few interesting thing to observe
text: You can see a tree, a ritual pot and into a house some snakes, generally small or medium size. The host are frendly, but the attraction is poor. price approx. 2usd, without photos. (incredible, you must pay to take a pic, so bad)

title: Worth a visit, but  not  major  site
text:
Worshipping snakes-interesting to see  and  get a  good  guide  to    explain   its origin and history. I ahd  numerous  questions  to teh snake  devotees   and learned a  lot.
Its  fascinating that they gave  the  CAtholic  church  a  lot  to built  on  right across  the. street. "Travel a   lot  and lose  all  Prejudices"

text: we saw this temple, i was too scared to go in. it was in Ouidah town, which is quite a distance from the hotel.

title: O ber√ßo do Voodoo
text:
O Templo da Pythons √© para obrigat√≥ria para quem est√° pr√≥ximo a Ouidah! S√£o apresentadas algumas hist√≥rias √† respeito do Voodoo, seus ritos e cren√ßas. Todas as serpentes n√£o tem presas e os guias as colocam em seu pesco√ßo. Caso n√£o goste se manifeste rapidamente como eu, caso n√£o eles coloca em seu pesco√ßo e voc√™ nem percebe!

O Templo trata-se de um quintal simples, com √°rvores e alguns espa√ßos para sacrif√≠cios e ora√ß√µes, agora o mais curioso √© que h√° uma igreja em frente ao templo.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: There is something there
text: The Temple is part of the local beliefs with a sacred Iroko tree and the 50 or so pythons in a special round house which you can visit. Place the python on your arm. Pretty awesome. Nice short explanation (ask questions to get deeper) by the son of the main protector of the site. Small fee (1100 Fcfa, 1,50 Euros). Extra fee for photos. Right across from the Catholic cathedral. No coincidence, but both survive. One can be a good Beninois catholic and go the the Python temple too. There is something magic there...

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Do not miss while in town!
text: Indeed, this is one of the most important temples of Voodoo adherents. Recently renovated, the temple is open both for voodooists and lay visitors. Though, the latters are not allowed to visit the most sacred part of the temple complex - the pythons graveyard, what they can see (altars and the small temple with alive pythons in it) is enough for willing to visit this site. Besides, as you wil be guided by a priest, you will be offered a possibility to put a python on your shoulders or around your neck (no danger in doing this). You can also visit the town main Catholic cathedral (built in 1908) for comparison.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Quick 15 minutes but cannot skip if you come here
text: best touist option if you're visiting. costs 1000 cfa or somehting per person + extra for camera. try not going if there are two many people and wait to separate out a bit. enter if you are sure you cna handle the snakes. check out the church opposite it too..

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Un lieu pour touriste
text: Paradoxalement, m√™me si le Temple des pythons est utilis√© pour des rites vaudou on en ressort avec la d√©sagr√©able impression d'avoir pass√© un quart d'heure dans un costume de touriste-pigeon. Le guide (obligatoire, h√©las), ne vous dit rien des rites, mais vous oblige quasiment √† photographier vos compagnons de voyage avec un python autour du cou. Si quelqu'un vous a expliqu√©, ailleurs, la raison d'√™tre de ce temple, vous pouvez sauter la visite.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Pra quem gosta de serpentes
text: Esse templo √© dedicado as serpentes, tem varias duzias delas em uma sala, e pagando uma taxa adicional voc√™ pode tirar uma foto com uma delas em torno do pesco√ßo. Os guias tambem podem dar algumas explica√ßoes sobre a religiao em si, mas as que nos recebemos foram bem superficiais.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Che bei pitoncini!
text: Un tempio molto carino che vi da la possibilit√† di vedere, toccare, accarezzare e venerare i loro serpenti sacri: trattasi di piccoli pitoni, molto gentili e "accondiscendenti". Ho visto persone terrorizzate dai rettili mettersi al collo questi animali.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Only quick visit needed, but fun
text: It is a small courtyard with several snakes, which the caretakers will put around your neck if you'd like. It costs money to enter and can be a quick stop (15 minutes) during your tour of Ouidah.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: With tempered expectation, it is wonderful
text:
The name of the place is misleading.  It is a courtyard, with a small concrete structure inside that houses the pythons.  The guide was very friendly, and he explained many of the beliefs concerning the snakes.  He then offered to put them on us, which was cool.  We got to pet them as well.  They are non-venomous, and actually pretty lazy and used to people.

This was obviously a holy place to the local population, and it was spiritual to feel that, but if you just went by the name you'd expect something a lot grander.  I still loved it; my companions, not so much.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: The place for a 'python necklace'
text: When the guide put the python around my neck, I stood there for a picture -- but no one else was brave enough to try it.  They all refused ... including a whole group of college students.  Later I reflected, 'what was I thinking?' This spot was a bit over-rated.  Note a great value for the price.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Es kommt auf die Betrachtung an !
text:
Kommt man als normaler Tourist in Ouidah an, so geh√∂rt zum Programm einfach der besuch des Pythontempels. Dort findet man etwa 20 fast reglos liegende Schlangen, die - wenn man will - einem um den Hals gelegt werden. Nichts besonders also.

Kommt man jedo h nach Ouidah, das Zentrum des westafrikanischen Voodoo, dann bekommt diesem Tempel eine ganz au√üergew√∂hliche Bedeutung in ritueller Hinsicht zu; eine Platz der neben so manchen wichtigen rituellen Pl√§tzen der Voodoo im Ort, aber auch im umliegenden Wald, zum Erfahren bedeutsam ist; vorausgesetzt man, wei√ü woman hingeht.    .

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Indiana Jones moment
text: A room full of slithering snakes, creepy.  Just like in Indiana Jones.  Can't help but have an emotional impact.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Klein aber ok
text: Der Tempel ist recht klein, hat man in 10min locker gesehen. Man kann Pythons anfassen und sich um den Hals legen lassen. Die Pythons bewahren sie in einem Schrein auf, wo man auch rein kann. Da es dort drin sehr kalt ist sind die Pythons sehr steif und bewegen sich kaum.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin

title: Disappointed
text:
i thought it would be a huge temple with lots of snakes and some history, but it was just a mud shack with about 30 medium sized snakes. Maybe less. Worse, it cost 1,110 CFA per person to go in and another 2,200 to take pictures.
The only high was the fact that you could touch the snakes and take pictures with them. i was quite disappointed.

placeInfo.name: Temple des Pythons
placeInfo.address: Face a la Basilique, Ouidah Benin
